name: ToxoplasmosisTestsForToxoplasmaGondiiByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Toxoplasmosis (Tests for Toxoplasma gondii by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of  Toxoplasma gondii by Culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Toxoplasma gondii by Culture),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
